climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Super Value 260 Loads: Up to 260 loads of laundry sheets for as low as $0.04 a load, lower cost and last longer use then others', great value for money. (up to 260 small loads = 130 large loads)

Effective Cleaning: Our laundry detergent sheets are formulated with an ultra-concentrated formula, upgraded surfactants and biological enzymes and fresh-scented essences, which improves the dissolution speed of the laundry sheets and also helps to remove dirt and various stains from your clothes, keeping them clean and fresh.

Gentle Formula：Contains natural botanicals that make our laundry detergent gentle and non-irritating, low foaming and non-phosphate, free of bleach, dyes or other irritants, safe for children and adults with sensitive skin, and suitable for various types of textiles.

Eco-friendly: Biodegradable laundry detergent strips are environmentally friendly. The drawer-type recyclable box gives you easy access, and easy to store. Zero plastic no plastic pollution. Reduce your carbon footprint by reducing bulky plastic jars of detergent transportation.

Convenient and Tidy: Convenient detergent sheets mean goodbye to cup measurements, no drips, no spills, each tablet is pre-cut, just put it in the washer with your clothes for cleaning, suitable for both traditional and HE washing machines.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Up To 260 Loads Laundry Detergent Sheets, Lower Cost and Last longer Use Say goodbye to measuring, no drips, no spills! Traditional detergents and powders need to be measured and are prone to spills, leading to messes! With the new laundry sheets, you can say goodbye to bulky plastic jars, spilling liquid detergents or clumping laundry powder. Just put the sheets and clothes into the washing machine to complete the washing task conveniently and efficiently. Rapid dissolve technology allows our laundry detergent sheets to completely dissolve in water, safe for septic tanks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There is very little scent. I have very soft water and some soaps do not dissolve, leaving soap residue on the clothes. Just half a sheet cleans a whole load at my house, it may take more if you have hard water. All of it dissolves, leaving no residue, just clean laundry. Good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are very nice and handy. They work well and are easy to use. No waste and no mess. No more sticky mess on my shelves to clean up. Best idea ever! They do a good job with cleaning my clothes. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good not great
reviews.reviewText: These pretty much took the stains out so in that way it gets 5*s. But it didn’t suds much. And the sheets smelled good in the box but my clothes didn’t smell at all and I wanted them to. I’m ok with the purchase but would probably buy a different next time just to see if I can find one with all of the attributes I want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT PRODUCT - GREAT JOB - REASONABLE PRICE
reviews.reviewText: i use 1.5 sheets because i do big bulky loads and lots of dyeing towels and dogger towels (on top of our normal towels/clothes/sheets, etc.) these are great - dissolve easily, leave no residue and smell "fresh" instead of heavy perfumes. will continue to purchase these - like them that much - if it isn't broken, no need to fix. stick with what you know and i know and like these - a LOT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Have to use more sheets than suggested
reviews.reviewText: Does not leave a smell on clothing, which I don't mind at all. However, clothes aren't coming out as clean as with our previous laundry detergent. I have to use more sheets than suggested to get clothes acceptable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite happy that these clean so well.
reviews.reviewText: I have my 1st front load washer and liquid soap was making a mess of things. The amount of loads the ad says you can do is half as much as you need to use a minimum of 2 sheets per load of wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I like these little sheets. They don't leave a heavy fragrance behind and the entire sheet dissolves in warm water (don't know about cold water). They are so easy to use, come in a nifty little box that's easy to store, and there's a ton of these sheets in the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW! who knew?
reviews.reviewText: Started using these yesterday and I am delighted. My cloths came out smelling so good and clean but not the gross heavy smell of the other brands. To get 260 loads of laundry done at this price is spectacular. I will surly be buying these again and again and again.
